title: Unlock the magic of magnesium with Advanced Magnesium+ Powder
content:
Cyclist
Unlock the magic of magnesium with Advanced Magnesium+ Powder

Given that it’s proven to improve sleep, mood and athletic performance among widespread other benefits, magnesium is unquestionably a key component of a healthy and complete diet.

Yet the importance of this little-known electrolyte is often overlooked, leading to many of us being deficient in this essential mineral without even knowing it. With JSHealth Vitamins’ new Advanced Magnesium+ Powder, you can enjoy all the physical and mental benefits of magnesium in a delicious formula that fits seamlessly into your daily wellness ritual.

• Save 20% on all JSHealth Vitamins products site-wide until 31st October by using the code CYCLIST20 at checkout. Click here to shop now!

The importance of magnesium

Whether you’re a professional cyclist or simply looking for a more healthy lifestyle, magnesium is a critical component in keeping your body moving. It plays a role in energy metabolism and assists with normal muscle function, and the need for magnesium has been shown to increase at higher levels of physical activity.

A study conducted during the 2019 Vuelta a España, for instance, found that riders taking a daily 400mg magnesium supplement benefitted from improved muscle recovery and a lower risk of muscle damage than those who were given a placebo.

Needless to say, few if any of us will be signing up for a three-week Grand Tour anytime soon, but magnesium’s advantages don’t end there.

Improved muscle relaxation is another key benefit, while magnesium also supports nervous system health and wellbeing, heart and bone health, bone density, sugar and carbohydrate metabolism, protein synthesis… the list goes on.

In other words, magnesium is a multitasking mineral that contributes to far-reaching improvements to your overall health and wellbeing, regardless of your age or level of physical activity. And with the Advanced Magnesium+ Powder providing a hit of three of the most easily absorbed forms of magnesium in each serve, it’s tailor-made to fit in with your self-care protocol.

The JSHealth Vitamins story

JSHealth Vitamins was founded by Jessica Sepel, a clinical nutritionist whose passion for wellness and healthy living saw her start a health blog in 2012 that quickly grew into a global wellness community drawn in by her commitment and ability to simplify the often-confusing world of vitamins and supplements.

On the way to becoming a three-time bestselling wellness author, Jessica decided to put her knowledge into practice with her own range of products, launching the Hair + Energy ingestible haircare formula that remains a bestseller to this day.

These days the JSHealth Vitamins website offers a huge array of wellness products, from skin and haircare supplements to protein powders and hormone replacements. Women’s health is at the heart of the JSHealth community, but it also offers a range of men’s-specific products, and of course the Advanced Magnesium+ Powder is a supplement anyone can benefit from.

The power of powder

Given magnesium’s well-established importance to overall body health and mental wellbeing, it’s no surprise that a magnesium supplement in tablet form has been part of the JSHealth product lineup for some time. By introducing a powder supplement, however, those wellness benefits take on the added dimension of a deliciously refreshing Raspberry Lemonade flavour.

‘We wanted to provide our customers a new way to experience our best-selling triple-form magnesium blend by offering a powder format that fits in with a wide range of different lifestyle routines,’ Jessica says.

‘Magnesium is an important nutrient for daily wellness and this delicious powder is a wonderful way to make a mindful moment of getting your daily dose.’

As already mentioned, the supplement includes three different forms of magnesium – magnesium glycinate, magnesium citrate and magnesium amino acid chelate – all of which have high absorption rates for increased effectiveness.

Enjoying the Advanced Magnesium+ Powder is simple. Mix one level scoop with water, stir well and consume immediately. Take twice daily for a total of 402mg of magnesium, with a 180g bottle providing a month’s supply.

All ingredients are sourced with care, and the Advanced Magnesium+ Powder contains no animal products and so is vegan-friendly.

Discover the Advanced Magnesium+ Powder difference

There’s no questioning the difference a magnesium supplement can make to athletic performance and recovery, as well as overall health and wellbeing. With Advanced Magnesium+ Powder, you can reap all those benefits in a form that you actually enjoy, safe in the knowledge that it’s backed up by the same commitment JSHealth Vitamins makes with all its products: ‘The first two ingredients are always care and science.’

Scoop, stir, sip and enjoy – it couldn’t be simpler.
